test.title: Basic Class field
test.output: ["Foo{x: int x, y: int y} > a: 123 ; x: null ; y: 10 ; z: 20"]
test.source-generated:
<<<< [SOURCES_BEGIN] >>>>
<<<< NAMESPACE="" >>>>
<<<< CODE_UNIT_START="/test" >>>>
class Foo {

  int getZ() {
    return y * 2;
  }

  void test(int a) {
    var z = getZ();
    var s = '$this > a: $a ; x: $x ; y: $y ; z: $z';
    print(s);
  }

}
<<<< CODE_UNIT_END="/test" >>>>
<<<< [SOURCES_END] >>>>

<<<< [SOURCES_BEGIN] >>>>
<<<< NAMESPACE="" >>>>
<<<< CODE_UNIT_START="/test" >>>>
class Foo {

  int getZ() {
    return y * 2;
  }

  void test(int a) {
    var z = getZ();
    var s = String.valueOf( this ) + " > a: " + a + " ; x: " + x + " ; y: " + y + " ; z: " + z;
    print(s);
  }

}
<<<< CODE_UNIT_END="/test" >>>>
<<<< [SOURCES_END] >>>>
